flawed_nl_solution:
Jack had 13 more than 8 notebooks for a total of 13+8 = <<13+8=21>>21 notebooks
He gave 5 notebooks to Paula so he has 21-5 = <<21-5=18>>18 notebooks left
He gave another 6 to Mike so he has 18-6 = <<18-6=12>>12 notebooks left
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
